stories.description: The system must communicate with weather stations via satellite to monitor health, provide reports of problems, update embedded software, and remotely control weather station systems in case of issues.

stories.definitionOfDone: • System Power Management: The system power management functionality includes: automatic battery charging when possible, generator shutdown in potentially damaging weather conditions (e.g. high wind), and logging of power events for 30 days.
stories.description: The system must ensure batteries are charged when possible and shut down generators in potentially damaging weather conditions.
stories.title: Ensure Batteries Are Charged When

stories.definitionOfDone: • System Reconfiguration: The system reconfiguration process is automated, and the software update and instrument switching are successfully completed without errors or data loss. The system is restored to a known good state.
stories.description: The system must allow for software updates and backup instrument switching in case of system failure.
